Body.Content:
Introduction

Organizers and co-organizers of Teams Town Hall events can now edit event details directly from their Outlook calendar. This update introduces a direct link to the Teams Town Hall edit page, streamlining the event management experience and aligning it with the existing webinar editing capabilities for consistency across event types.

This message is associated with Microsoft 365 Roadmap ID 496986.

When this will happen

General Availability (Worldwide): Rollout will begin in mid-August 2025 and is expected to complete by late August 2025.

How this affects your organization

This update does not introduce any changes to default settings or user permissions. It enhances usability for event organizers by providing a more intuitive way to manage Town Hall details. No end-user or admin action is required.

What you can do to prepare

No preparation is needed. However, you may wish to inform event organizers of this new capability to improve awareness and adoption. For more information about managing Teams Town Hall events, visit the https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoftteams/town-hall-overview.

Compliance considerations

No compliance considerations identified, review as appropriate for your organization.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Edit and manage Teams Town Hall instances in Microsoft Outlook
